message.content:
<<>>: PrintWriter.write <<>>: BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file)); String line; int lineCount = 0; while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) { writer.write("
"); writer.write(line); writer.write("
"); lineCount++; if (lineCount == 2) break; } br.close(); <<>>: The code reads the file line by line using BufferedReader and writes each line to the PrintWriter wrapped in a div tag. It stops after reading two lines. This way, the first and second lines of the file are displayed separately.
